text: @realDonaldTrump Of course because everything is your fault! The riots increased because you inciting violence, 120K Americans dead, 2.22M confirmed #COVID19 cases and the numbers growing. Americans maintain their wish to throw you out of office! In November we'll vote for @JoeBiden!

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
